name: Reinos
description:
Reinos is a 2D Platformer based on teleportation and alternate dimensions.

Reinos comes in two modes either endless or classic. Players need to achieve the objective of the game as soon as possible however, the twist is that they get teleported every 10 seconds. Can you complete the game and set a highscore?

Reinos was developed for Design Championships 2019-Mumbai Contest.

Theme - 10 seconds

This game was developed by Bhavya Muni.
